articles.description: Katie Taylor says beating Chantelle Cameron to become a two-weight undisputed champion was the best night of her career.
articles.title: 'Great to prove people wrong - I'm back on top again'

articles.description: Joe Root follows England Test captain Ben Stokes and withdraws from the 2024 Indian Premier League.
articles.title: Root follows Stokes and withdraws from IPL

articles.description: Kai Havertz says he "put his ego aside" to help Arsenal move to the top of the Premier League with victory at Brentford.
articles.title: 'I put my ego aside' - 'adorable' Havertz earns Arsenal 'statement win'

articles.description: Two draws in a row gives hope to title challengers, says Phil McNulty, but those results might be the best their rivals can hope for.
articles.title: 'Title race may not be formality most are expecting'

articles.description: Sydney Sixers captain Ellyse Perry stars in a nine-wicket win that leaves Sydney Thunder in fourth in the Women's Big Bash League.
articles.title: Perry denies Knight's Thunder home play-off

articles.description: Chelsea manager Mauricio Pochettino is "angry and disappointed" as his side slump to a 4-1 defeat by Newcastle United at St James' Park.
articles.title: Pochettino angry Chelsea 'so soft in every challenge'

articles.description: Jannik Sinner beats Novak Djokovic to help Italy overcome Serbia to join Australia in the Davis Cup final.
articles.title: Sinner stuns Djokovic as Italy reach Davis Cup final

articles.description: Jeopardy is in short supply in F1, but there's a fight going on between titans Mercedes and Ferrari over second in the constructors' championship.
articles.title: 'Mercedes battle for honour with Ferrari on knife edge'

articles.description: Barcelona require a late own goal to salvage a point at mid-table Rayo Vallecano in La Liga.
articles.title: Barcelona need own goal to salvage draw at Rayo

articles.description: Ireland's Katie Taylor dethrones England's Chantelle Cameron to avenge her only career defeat in an extraordinary fight in Dublin.
articles.title: Taylor edges Cameron in epic to avenge only defeat
